content:
ICS 23/ CSE 23 - Midterm 1 Study Questions

Doing the assigned readings from Chapters 1-7 and solving the following questions will provide a good preparation for the first midterm exam.

  1. Problem R-4.12 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  2. Problem R-4.17 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  3. Problem R-4.22 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  4. Problem R-4.23 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  5. Problem R-4.28 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  6. Problem R-5.1 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  7. Problem R-5.7 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  8. Problem C-5.5 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  9. Problem C-5.8 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  10. Problem C-5.9 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  11. Problem R-6.5 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  12. Problem R-6.9 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  13. Problem C-6.14 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  14. Problem R-7.4 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  15. Problem R-7.5 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  16. Problem R-7.11 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  17. Problem R-7.14 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  18. Problem C-7.2 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  19. Problem C-7.4 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  20. Problem C-7.21 from Goodrich-Tamassia.

Additionally, for an extra challenge, you can think about the following problems:

  1. Problem C-5.8 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  2. Problem C-5.12 from Goodrich-Tamassia. (Just for fun--this is a Microsoft interview question.)
  3. Problem C-6.19 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  4. Problem C-6.20 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  5. Problem C-7.13 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
